description:
It was discovered that Plexus Archiver incorrectly handled directory
traversal during extraction. An attacker could possibly use this for a
Zip-Slip attack.

plexus-archiver.description: A collection of Plexus components for handling archives

title: Plexus Archiver vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Plexus Archiver could be made to overwrite files if it received specially
crafted Zip file.
